per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=mv_a = q1;
per_frame_3=mv_x = mv_x + 1*sin(time);
per_frame_4=mv_y = mv_y + 1*cos(time);
per_frame_5=mv_dx = mv_dx + 1.25*sin(fps*8);
per_frame_6=mv_dy = mv_dy + 1.35*sin(fps*8);
per_frame_7=mv_r = mv_r + 1*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_8=mv_g = mv_g + 1*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_9=mv_b = mv_b + 1*sin(time*0.665);
per_frame_10=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(time*1.13);
per_frame_11=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(time*1.23);
per_frame_12=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.33);
per_pixel_1=//zoom = zoom + 0.0125*q1;
per_pixel_2=//rot = rot + 0.025*sin(fps*10)*q1;
per_pixel_3=warp = 0;
warp_1=`float2 d, uv_y, uv_z;
warp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body
warp_5=`{
warp_6=`
warp_7=`   float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_8=`   float3 rand = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`   d = texsize.zw*16;
warp_11=`   dx = GetBlur2(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur2(uv_orig - float2(1,0)*d);
warp_12=`   dy = GetBlur2(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur2(uv_orig - float2(0,1)*d);
warp_13=`   
warp_14=`   d = lerp(uv_orig,uv,1);
warp_15=`   uv_y = d - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*16;
warp_16=`   uv_z = d - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*16;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`   ret.y = GetPixel(uv_y).y - 0.006 + (1-GetPixel(uv_orig).x)*0.018;
warp_20=`   ret.z = GetPixel(uv_z).z - 0.006 + (0+GetPixel(uv_orig).x)*0.018;
warp_21=`
warp_22=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv+rand*texsize.zw*.5 ).x;
warp_23=`    ret.x += (ret.x - GetBlur3(uv).x)*0.2 + rand*0.01;
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`float2 d;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`
comp_4=`shader_body
comp_5=`{
comp_6=`   d = texsize.zw*1.5;
comp_7=`   dx = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(1,0)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(1,0)*d);
comp_8=`   dy = GetPixel(uv_orig + float2(0,1)*d) - GetPixel(uv_orig - float2(0,1)*d);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret = GetPixel(uv).x*(1-length(float2(dx.y,dy.y)*8))*pow(hue_shader,6)*1.4;
comp_12=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(1,1,1),length(float2(dx.z,dy.z)*4));
comp_13=`
comp_14=`
comp_15=`}
